taskGroup.name: Stardust Developer Cheat Sheet
taskGroup.intro: Welcome to the Stardust Developer Cheat Sheet.

task.name: Stardust Developer Quick Start Tutorial
task.intro: Welcome to the Developer Quick Start Tutorial. This cheat sheet guides you through the basic steps of building a workflow model with a process definition and its elements in the Stardust Developer Modeling Perspective.

taskGroup.name: Stardust Support Case Tutorial
taskGroup.intro: Welcome to the Developer Support Case Tutorial. This cheat sheet guides you through the steps of building a sample business process, automate and deploy it in the Stardust Developer Modeling Perspective.

task.name: Getting Started
task.intro: This cheat sheet will guide you through the steps of preparing the the workbench to start with your support case tutorial.

task.name: Creating the Process Definition
task.intro: This cheat sheet will guide you through the steps of creating a process and opening its diagram.

task.name: Creating Structured Data Types
task.intro: This cheat sheet will guide you through the steps of creating structured data types for a process model.

task.name: Adding Activities
task.intro: This cheat sheet will guide you through the steps of adding activities to your process definition.

task.name: Integrating Applications
task.intro: This cheat sheet will guide you through the steps of integrating applications.

task.name: Handling Data
task.intro: This cheat sheet will guide you through the steps of adding and handling data in the process.

task.name: Control Flow
task.intro: This cheat sheet will guide you through the steps of setting up control flow between activities.

task.name: Defining Roles and Organizations
task.intro: This cheat sheet will guide you through the steps of defining and assigning roles and organizations.

task.name: Triggers
task.intro: This cheat sheet guides you through the process of creating and assigning a manual trigger.

task.name: Deploying a Workflow Model
task.intro: This cheat sheet guides you through the process of deploying your workflow model.

task.name: Managing Users
task.intro: This cheat sheet guides you through the process of creating individual users and assign them to the created roles.

task.name: Executing Workflow
task.intro: This cheat sheet guides you through the process of executing your workflow.

taskGroup.name: Stardust Scoped Participant Tutorial
taskGroup.intro: Welcome to a small tutorial using scoped participants. This cheat sheet guides you through the steps of creating and binding department structures.

task.name: Creating the Model and Organizational Structure
task.intro: This cheat sheet guides you through the steps of creating a workflow with a scoped environment.

task.name: Creating the Users and Departments in the Stardust Portal
task.intro: This cheat sheet will guide you through the steps of creating departments in the Stardust Process Platform Portal.

task.name: Using Different Departments in the Portal
task.intro: This cheat sheet guides you through the steps of of entering department data and checking the worklist depending on this data.

taskGroup.name: Configuration Variables Cheat Sheet
taskGroup.intro: This cheatsheet demonstrates how a workflow can be adjusted during runtime with the help of a configuration variable value.

task.name: Creating a Model with a Configuration Variable
task.intro: This cheat sheet guides you through the steps of creating a model having a configuration variable, which is used in a transition condition.

task.name: Running the Workflow with Different Variable Values
task.intro: This cheat sheet guides you through the process of running a workflow depending on different values of a configuration variable.

taskGroup.name: Multiple Models Cheat Sheet
taskGroup.intro: This cheatsheet demonstrates how to create a provider model and a consumer model using some of its elements.

task.name: Creating a Provider Model
task.intro: This cheat sheet will guide you through the steps of creating a provider model.

task.name: Creating a Consumer Model
task.intro: This cheat sheet will guide you through the steps of creating a consumer model.

task.name: Running Consumer Model Workflow using Provider Model Elements
task.intro: This cheat sheet will guide you through the steps of running the workflow of the created consumer model using elements from the provider model.
